alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 2:11AM PST until January 14 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations up to 4 inches below 6500 feet and 5 to 12 inches above 6500 feet, west of US-395. Snow accumulations 3 to 8 inches north and east of Ravendale. Winds gusting 40 to 50 mph. Wind gusts up to 70 mph in wind prone areas along US-395. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads may become slick and blowing snow may cause lower visibility while driving. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
